QuestData.Title: Hexed Hatchlings
QuestData.Description:
I've found where those evil witches have been tainting our falcons! You see those charms?
<Notley motions toward the high perches and roofs nearby.>
They're using those to infect our flock with their evil magic as they hatch. I think Winston can get up there to take out the charms, but someone will need to direct him.
I'm not quite healed up enough to take on a whole camp of falconers. Can you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Falconer's Whistle to destroy $1oa bewitching charms in the Corlain Aviary.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken care of the charms?
QuestData.RewardText:
The charms are broken? That's a relief!
We may just be able to save our flock after all.
